item.title: Best sideloaded Android apps
item.description: It’s time to celebrate the biggest advantage of Android devices, sideloading! ReVanced Manager/YouTube ReVanced Link to heading Removes ads on YouTube App, enables play in background feature. Able to patch various other app too via ReVanced Manager. Fastest way: Visit: https://revanced.net/ Download APK file for YouTube ReVanced and MicroG and install them. (MicroG makes it possible for you to log into your google account with ReVanced) Patch the app yourself (get APK files from APKMirror):
